description: His stripped-down Volkswagen hot hatch is slightly lighter than other GTIs sold here. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Me And My Car: National runner Ng Chin Hui says driving his rare Golf GTI is akin to sprinting
title_page: Me And My Car: National runner Ng Chin Hui says driving his rare Golf GTI is akin to sprinting | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ Standing tall and lean, as you would expect of a serious athlete, Mr Ng Chin Hui is an accomplished runner who specialises in 400m and 4x100m events.
He has represented Singapore in various international competitions since 2011.
